name: Lyle in Cube Sector
storyline: Oh no! Lyle's kitty has been stolened and now he must journey through the wonked out lands of the cube sector to retrieve his meowmeow companion!
summary: Lyle in Cube Sector is a freeware metroidvania where you work with cubes. With the right upgrades, you can throw them at enemies, use them to propel yourself higher, and make them materialize in your hands. You must use these abilities skillfully in the cube sector to find your cat.

videos.name: Speedrun
videos.title: Lyle in Cube Sector Single Segment in 24:29
